content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam power system at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position 0.5, 6.0)
- Steam Engine (position 0.5, 0.5)

### Iron ore processing facility at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position -5.0, -65.0)
- Burner Mining Drill (position 47.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chests (positions 46.5, -83.5; 48.5, -83.5; 5.5, -79.5; 10.5, -79.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure you have the Offshore Pump in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors due to lack of pipes
- Always check your inventory for pipes before attempting to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine. Ensure you have enough pipes available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
